attributes.action: Stop the influx of unskilled un-employable Migrant Workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is more and more migrant workers arriving in GB everyday, both skilled and non-skilled. There are only so many jobs, houses, school places and hospital beds to go around so the powers that be should be looking at some vetting system which would stop the un-skilled untrained EU migrant worker from entering the country. This points/vetting system would allow only the skilled EU workers to enter the country, where they will not be a drain on the system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
